All CBD products on this website contain .03% THC or less. Chill products are made using premium CBD isolate only.

settings.shipping_policy_content:
Fulfilment Centre operates 8am-4pm M-F and 8-12pm Saturday.  Closed Sundays.  All orders processed prior to 12noon will be shipped that day for delivery between 1-3 days UK (dependant on service and area)

All orders in other countries & inquiries please email info@chill.com

You will receive an email containing your Tracking Number once your package has been shipped from our distribution center.
